a.title: Go to Lake Shore Public Schools
Go to Lake Shore High School
Go to North Lake High School

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;
p.span: With the Governor's Executive Order, in person instruction has been suspended for the remainder of the year, unless the order is lifted at a later date. What does this mean for our students here at Lake Shore?

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;
p.span: While you will find the Governor's Executive Order and a summary of that order, Lake Shore will be providing you with our specific response to this order in the coming days. Rest assured, Seniors will graduate, teachers will continue to teach on-line through SeeSaw and Schoology, and resources necessary for students to access learning will continue to be available to all of our students.

While far from ideal and never a situation we hoped to be in, Lake Shore is in a very good position to continue to provide online learning, it's not something that will be new to our students and our teachers. More details to follow. Most importantly, continue to stay safe and stay home.

a.title: Talking to Kids About the Coronavirus

span.a: Talking to Kids About the Coronavirus

p.span: Contact us at covid19help@lsps.org for any assistance request during this challenging time. No request is too big; no need is too trivial.

h2.style: font-size: 30px; line-height: 1.2em; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: Tahoma;

span.style: line-height: 1.2em; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 48px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
text-align: justify; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-size: 22px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.span: Lake Shore Public Schools provides an exceptional education for all 3,350 students in a safe and nurturing environment. Our students are empowered to excel in an evolving global society, supported by the collaborative effort of staff, families, and community.

span.style: text-align: justify; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-size: 22px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

br.span: From preschool through our graduating seniors, Lake Shore students are a part of a strong school system that works hard every day for the benefit of our students. Our guiding principles, Inspiration, Innovation, and Celebration, are woven into the fabric of everything we do.

br.style: line-height: 1.2em; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: justify;
line-height: 1.2em; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: justify;
br.span: Lake Shore offers accelerated learning opportunities starting in elementary school. Students consistently have strong test scores, and teachers utilize the latest technology to track individual student progress throughout the school year. The district currently offers STEM education starting in Kindergarten. Elementary students enjoy daily enrichment opportunities and a full calendar of extracurricular activities. Our middle and high schools are home to award winning athletics and fine and performing art programs. Lake Shore offers dual enrollment and early college opportunities for students free of charge.

span.br: Macomb County families seeking a quality education for the preschool-11th grade students are invited to enroll using our Enrollment page.

span.style: font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

div.span: Sometimes you don't need words to express the kind of joy this school district can bring to your life. Discover your reasons to enroll at Lake Shore Public Schools by viewing our

a.title: Promotional Video
a.style: font-size: 22px; font-family: Tahoma; letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: none; line-height: 1.2em;

span.style: font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: line-height: 1.2em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 6px 0px 0px; display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;
p.span:
Lake Shore Public Schools is a place of possibilities and a Shorian experience is life changing.
Enrollment for the 2020-21 school year is open! We are more than a school district. We are family, choosing Lake Shore every single day.

span.style: font-size: 22px; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.style: line-height: 1.2em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 13px;
p.span: Lake Shore Public Schools serves 3,350 students in 6 schools which cover a diverse student population.

ul.style: line-height: 1.2em; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 13px; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px 0px 0px 1.3em;

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: Generous community passed a $35 million Safety, Security, and Technology Bond.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: District-wide 1:1 initiative designed to cultivate learning using Chromebooks.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: Championship athletic programs with league and state titles.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: Anti-bullying programs to provide all students with a safe learning environment.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: Fine and Performing Arts programs participate in state and national competitions.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: International Exchange programs with China, Spain, Germany, and Italy.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: Advanced Placement, Early College, Dual Enrollment, Career and Technical Education, online, Advanced English Language Arts, and Mathematics classes.

li.style: line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; border: 0px none rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 0px;
li.span: Lake Shore employees live and breathe the philosophy that every child shall receive an exceptional education in a safe and nurturing environment.

span.style: text-align: center; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-size: 22px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

br.span: Lake Shore Public Schools is a place of possibilities and a Shorian experience is life changing. Show off your #ShorianPride and check off some of the sweet adventures that Lake Shore has to offer. How many have you conquered?

span.style: line-height: 1.2em; font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif, serif, EmojiFont; color: rgb(33, 33, 33);

div.span: Note: Each school (LSPS, LSHS, Kennedy, Masonic, Rodgers, Violet) has a building-specific Events Calendar.

div.span:

3,350 students

1 middle school
1 high school

63,193 school breakfasts served
247,378 school lunches served
124,369 bus miles
2,280 Chromebooks distributed
300 Class of 2020 graduates
1 Lake Shore

p.span: There have been many reminders of what Lake Shore Public Schools stands for. Please enjoy our Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram, a collection of reasons why Lake Shore is our home.
